result.eng: Excuse me, are you from the stone age?
result.ga: gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thú
result.orig: gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thú
result.html: gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thúExcuse me, are you from the stone age?
result.ponchtml: gaḃ mo leiṫscéal an ón ċloċaois ṫúExcuse me, are you from the stone age?

result.html: gabh mo leithscéalExcuse me!
result.ponchtml: gaḃ mo leiṫscéalExcuse me!

result.ga: gabh mo leithscéal a dhuine uasal
result.orig: gabh mo leithscéal a dhuine uasal
result.html: gabh mo leithscéal a dhuine uasalExcuse me, sir.
result.ponchtml: gaḃ mo leiṫscéal a ḋuine uasalExcuse me, sir.

result.eng: Excuse me? What do you mean?
result.ga: gabh mo leithscéal cad atá i gceist agat
result.orig: gabh mo leithscéal cad atá i gceist agat
result.html: gabh mo leithscéal cad atá i gceist agatExcuse me? What do you mean?
result.ponchtml: gaḃ mo leiṫscéal cad atá i gceist agatExcuse me? What do you mean?

result.html: níl leithscéal agatYou have no excuse.
result.ponchtml: níl leiṫscéal agatYou have no excuse.

result.eng: I will see what is happening there, excuse me.
result.ga: feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéal
result.orig: feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéal
result.html: feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéalI will see what is happening there, excuse me.
result.ponchtml: feicfiḋ mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gaḃ mo leiṫscéalI will see what is happening there, excuse me.

result.eng: Excuse me. Can you say that again, please?
result.ga: gabh mo leithscéal an féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoil
result.orig: gabh mo leithscéal an féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoil
result.html: gabh mo leithscéal an féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoilExcuse me. Can you say that again, please?
result.ponchtml: gaḃ mo leiṫscéal an féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do ṫoilExcuse me. Can you say that again, please?

result.eng: Excuse me. What time is it?
result.ga: gabh mo leithscéal cén t-am atá sé
result.orig: gabh mo leithscéal cén t-am atá sé
result.html: gabh mo leithscéal cén t-am atá séExcuse me. What time is it?
result.ponchtml: gaḃ mo leiṫscéal cén t-am atá séExcuse me. What time is it?

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú meán foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.

result.eng: You can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ga: tá babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.orig: tá babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.html: tá babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbhYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ponchtml: tá babaí inleiṫscéil go fóill nó níl inti aċ luspairt linḃYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
